snippet.title: Realm of Darkness Huge PC Rpg More than 100 hours of authentic Role-Playing Experience!
snippet.description:
Realm of Darkness is a PC Rpg with a huge open world. over 100 side quests, over 100 hours of gameplay. lots of crafting and gathering. the battle system is based of Dungeons and Dragons. There are many races and classes to choose from. build your characters  anyway you want with stat and skill points.
Check the game out here:
http://ellisstudios.org/rod/index.html
